Cultural Events



Aaja Nachle

Ladies and gentlemen, dance enthusiasts, and rhythm aficionados, it's time to set the stage on fire and let your feet do the talking! Welcome to the most electrifying, heart-pounding, and foot-tapping spectacle - "Aaja Nachle" - the ultimate dancing competition.
In a world where the universal language of dance transcends boundaries, cultures, and emotions, "Aaja Nachle" is your platform to express yourself, tell stories, and unleash the magic of movement. Today, we gather to celebrate the passion, dedication, and sheer artistry of dancers from all walks of life.

Rangmanch

In a world where voices often echo unheard, and stories go untold, "Rangmanch" offers a powerful platform where artists step onto the streets, becoming the catalysts of social change. Today, we gather to celebrate the art of Nukkad Natak, the most potent tool of street theater that inspires, educates, and raises its voice for the voiceless.
